remarks: Change bound variable in a restricted description binder.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
cbvriotav.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvriotav $p |- ( iota_ x e. A ph ) = ( iota_ y e. A ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
